Package gameClient

Class Arena

java.lang.Object
gameClient.Arena
public class Arena
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a multi Agents Arena which move on a graph and eat Pokemons. We used https://github.com/simon-pikalov/Ariel_OOP_2020/blob/master/Assignments/Ex2/src/gameClient/Arena.java ,that was written by boaz.benmoshe, and improved it according to our implementation. We added 2 additional class variables: - _nodes_dist - hashmap which its keys are all graph's nodes keys, and the value is consists of a second hashmap. In the second hashmap, the keys are all other nodes, and the value is the total shortest distance bwtween current node to other node. - _avg_dist - contains the average distance between every 2 nodes in the graph.
